response.homeDescription: Elegant home in Kings Gate! Open floor plan! Gorgeous landscaping & mature trees. Near Charles Guy Park. Front living space/office with a built in fridge, granite counters, hardwood flooring, and french doors for privacy. Main living area has hardwood flooring and is open to the dining and kitchen. The kitchen features a huge skylight over the island, a farmhouse sink, stainless oven and microwave, a handy warming drawer, a walk in pantry, granite counters, a great serving counter. Tasteful custom paint & beautiful plantation shutters. A spacious and isolated master suite boasts a lovely sitting area, a door to the back patio, walk in closet, luxurious jetted bathtub, and separate shower. There is an additional isolated bedroom with private bath. Built in shelving! Solar tubes! The laundry room has a sink, storage, and freezer space. Covered and uncovered patios in the back. Gated side yard. Handy storage building in the back yard! Many other features!
